name: Rocket Kiwi 2
description:
A smol bullet-hell-ish game made in Fennel and Love2D for the 2021 Autumn Lisp Game Jam.

Massively incomplete, but it's what I got.  Will hopefully continue improving it a little.  Play it online at https://alopex.li/data/rk2/RocketKiwi2-0.1.0/ or download the Linux Appimage or .love file and play it locally.

Controls: Arrow keys move, X key shoots, Z key focuses (makes you move more slowly and precisely).

Source code is here: https://hg.sr.ht/~icefox/algj2021/  License: GPLv3
